site.name: AIDE POST CONFLIT – POST CONFLICT AID APC-PCA

hero.title: Healing Lives Beyond Conflict
hero.subtitle: APC-PCA is a Swiss non-profit association dedicated to supporting populations affected by war and displacement. We work at the intersection of psychological care, rehabilitation, education, and international cooperation to help individuals and communities rebuild their lives after conflict.

about.title: Our Mission
about.text: APC-PCA works at the intersection of psychological care, rehabilitation, education, and international cooperation to help individuals and communities rebuild their lives after conflict.

service.title: Our Services
service.support:
Who we support

Children affected by war and traumatic events

Refugees returning to their country of origin

Internally displaced persons

Communities living in conflict or post-conflict zones
service.wedo:
What we do

Provide psychological support and trauma-informed therapy for children and displaced persons

Develop and support rehabilitation and retreat centres for psychological and physical recovery

Organize individual and group therapy programs focused on stress and trauma reduction

Promote education and training in mental health, resilience, and trauma care

Support scientific research at the intersection of psychology and pedagogy

Encourage international cooperation and professional exchange
service.approach:
Our Approach

We believe that healing after conflict requires a holistic and long-term approach — combining psychological care, physical rehabilitation, education, and safe spaces where individuals can recover dignity, stability, and hope.
service.ourMission:
Our Mission

To contribute to the recovery and resilience of populations affected by conflict by creating sustainable structures of care, advancing knowledge on trauma, and supporting the developmental potential of children and adults impacted by war.
